config.lctech.common.comment.crafting.1: /reload required for any changes made here to take effect.
config.lctech.common.comment.crafting.2: Disabling will not remove any existing items/blocks from the world, nor prevent their use.
config.lctech.common.comment.crafting.al: Whether Energy Traders can be crafted.
Also affects crafting of energy trader accessories (Energy Trader Interface, Energy Capacity Upgrades, etc.)
Whether Fluid Tanks can be crafted.
Whether Fluid Traders can be crafted.
Also affects crafting of fluid trader accessories (Fluid Trader Interface, Fluid Capacity Upgrades, etc.)
Whether the Void Tank can be crafted.
config.lctech.server.comment.energy.batt: The amount of FE a Battery can hold.
The amount of FE a Large Battery can hold.
config.lctech.server.comment.energy.inte: The amount of FE that can be drained or restocked in a single drain tick (once per second).
config.lctech.server.comment.energy.trad: The maximum amount of FE an energy trader can sell or purchase in a single trade.
Regardless of the input, it will always be enforced to be less than or equal to the energy traders current maximum capacity
The amount of FE an energy trader can store by default.
config.lctech.server.comment.energy.upgr: The amount of energy storage added by the Energy Capacity Upgrade (Iron).
The amount of energy storage added by the Energy Capacity Upgrade (Gold).
The amount of energy storage added by the Energy Capacity Upgrade (Diamond).
The amount of energy storage added by the Energy Capacity Upgrade (Netherite).
config.lctech.server.comment.fluid.inter: The amount of fluid in mB that can be drained or restocked in a single drain tick (once per second).
The amount of fluid storage the Diamond Tank can hold in Buckets (1,000mB)
The amount of fluid storage the Gold Tank can hold in Buckets (1,000mB)
The amount of fluid storage the Iron Tank can hold in Buckets (1,000mB)
The amount of fluid storage the Netherite Tank can hold in Buckets (1,000mB)
config.lctech.server.comment.fluid.trade: The maximum quantity of fluids allowed to be sold or purchased in a single trade in Buckets (1,000mB).
Regardless of the input, it will always be enforced to be less than or equal to the fluid trades current maximum capacity.
The amount of fluid storage a fluid trade has by default in Buckets (1,000mB).
config.lctech.server.comment.fluid.upgra: The amount of fluid storage added by the Fluid Capacity upgrade (Iron) in Buckets (1,000mB)
The amount of fluid storage added by the Fluid Capacity upgrade (Gold) in Buckets (1,000mB)
The amount of fluid storage added by the Fluid Capacity upgrade (Diamond) in Buckets (1,000mB)
The amount of fluid storage added by the Fluid Capacity upgrade (Netherite) in Buckets (1,000mB)
gui.lctech.interface.fluid.difference.nb: Fluid NBT data does not match
tooltip.lctech.fluid.interact: Click with fluid container to fill/empty
tooltip.lctech.interface.energy.3: Can be used to automatically purchase or sell energy from any network energy trader
tooltip.lctech.interface.energy.4: Can be used to automatically drain or restock energy to/from any network energy trader you have access to
tooltip.lctech.interface.energy.5: Note: Has no auto-filtering for whether it should only restock or drain, so be sure to set your inputs/mode as appropriate
tooltip.lctech.interface.fluid.2: Can be used to automatically purchase or sell fluid from any network fluid trader
tooltip.lctech.interface.fluid.3: Can be used to automatically drain or restock fluids to/from any network fluid trader you have access to
tooltip.lctech.trader.energy.3: Can be used to Sell or Purchase Forge Energy from other players
tooltip.lctech.trader.fluid.3: Can be used to Sell or Purchase fluids from other players
tooltip.lctech.trader.network.energy.3: Can be used to Sell or Purchase Forge Energy from other players
tooltip.lctech.trader.network.energy.4: Accessible from any location via the Trading Terminal
tooltip.lctech.trader.network.fluid.3: Can be used to Sell or Purchase fluids from other players
tooltip.lctech.trader.network.fluid.4: Accessible from any location via the Trading Terminal
